knimeNode.name: Model Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes models as XML to file.

fullDescription.intro: This node saves any model into a file. Connect the input port to a model output port of any model generating node. Enter the destination location in the configuration dialog of the node. When executed, the node saves the incoming model as an XML description in the specified file.
fullDescription.option: The file the model is written to.
